definition: to come up with an idea/generation of ideas/inspiration
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: Where do creative people get their ideas?
sentences.chinese: 创意人如何发想他们的创意？

sentences.english: The series of works starts serial inspiration design from the muse: paper-cutting techniques.
sentences.chinese: 作品利用剪纸的连续剪技法，展开系列性的设计发想。

sentences.english: Everything is designed with your comfort in mind.
sentences.chinese: 每项设计都是依您的舒适需求而发想。

sentences.english: The course is going to discuss different ways of the new originality development.
sentences.chinese: 本课程首先讨论创意发想的数种方法。

definition: to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
variant of 策劃|策划[ce4 hua4]
(Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
variant of 聯結|联结[lian2 jie2]
